title.rendered: ARTICLE: “What are brokers looking for from lenders in 2023?” [CANADIAN MORTGAGE PROFESSIONAL, NOVEMBER 2022]

content.rendered:
Top brokers on how lending partners can help maximize the relationship next year.

 

Full article linked here.

Article Preview:

excerpt.rendered: Hugo Dos Reis, Mortgage Broker and Founding Partner at Vine Group Mortgage Alliance, also attested to a much-changed borrowing environment in 2022, indicating that a united approach and clear communication between brokers and lenders were now more important than ever.
